title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.12 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.12 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification of the
record. (b) The fee for
photocopies, copiable on ordinary equipment of the department, not exceeding 9
inches by 14 inches shall be 25 cents per page. (c) If a record or personal information
cannot be photocopied on ordinary equipment of the department or exceeds 9
inches by 14 inches the fee shall be the actual cost of reproduction, excluding
fixed cost of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง
2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
